contact-info:
If you want to reach out to me, feel free to send an e-mail to victor.probio@gmail.com.

For less formal inquiries, you can also contact me via one of the social buttons on this website, or send me a friend request on Discord (victorpl).

For privacy and safety concerns, my phone number is not public.
cv-info: Since my CV has private information, I won't make it available publicly on this website, for the same concerns described previously. However, for any business inquiries or opportunities, send me an e-mail, or contact me through LinkedIn with your proposal, and I'll be happy to share my CV and relevant additional information.
